section.title: Introduction
section.para: StemCellMine is an integrated database of genomic, expression and protein data for Homo sapiens, Mus musculus, Monodelphis domestica and Canis familiaris with emphasis on Stem Cell research. Integrating data makes it possible to run sophisticated data mining queries that span domains of biological knowledge.

para.ulink: What can I do with StemCellMine?

section.title: Quick Search
section.para: Search for genes, proteins or any other annotation. Help.

section.title: Aspects
section.para: Choose an aspect to explore the different types of data in StemCellMine and start queries.

section.title: StemCellMine QueryBuilder
section.para: Advanced users can use a flexible query interface to construct their own data mining queries. See user manual and tutorials.
